body:
Comment 19: 
yBteTMk2oS is wrong: it sends to the channel before printing, so the program exits
before you see all your output.

Yld6qIrFQN has the same issue, but is also working as expected: the closure captures (if
that's the right word) the address of the loop variable, not the value, so all the
goroutines end up printing the final value of that variable.
